description: Delete global model. Only for China mainland sellers and Korean sellers.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/global_product/get_global_model_list?access_token=access_token&global_item_id=2800146127&merchant_id=merchant_id&partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: tier_variation
schema.description: Tier variation information of global item.

schema.name: option_list
schema.description: Tier option list for corresponding tier name.

schema.name: stock_type
schema.description: Stock type. "1" means wms on hand, "2" means seller on hand.

schema.name: weight
schema.description: The weight of this global model, the unit is KG. If don't set the weight of this global model, will use the weight of global item by default.

schema.name: dimension
schema.description: The dimension of this global model. If don't set the dimension of this global model, will use the dimension of global item by default.

schema.name: package_height
schema.description: The height of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_length
schema.description: The length of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_width
schema.description: The width of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

schema.name: pre_order
schema.description: Pre-order information of this global model. Notes: If don't set the DTS of this global model, will use the DTS of the global item by default.

schema.name: is_fulfillment_by_shopee
schema.description: If it it a FBS model

schema.name: standardise_tier_variation
schema.description: Standardise Tier variation information of global item.
